sources.title: Landing of the Pilgrims (1940)
sources.description: Landing of the Pilgrims is a Terrytoons cartoon directed by Connie Rasinski. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/landing-of-the-pilgrims-1940/

metadata.Plot: The Mayflower arrives in the New World, transporting a group of unsmiling pilgrims. The local tribe of Native Americans is happy to see them, as they want paying customers for their products. After the pilgrims built their first settlement, a Thanksgiving day is proclaimed. A young boy hunts for a live turkey, but is stopped by Paul Revere. He has missed the deadline for Thanksgiving by a week.
